headline: GTA Online
subtitle: ALPHA BRAVO CHARLIE DELTA
content:
Calling all renegades, lawbreakers, and agitators. When a government-funded militia goes rogue, how do you stop them? Go roguer.

Meet the Los Santos Angels, a crack team of covert vigilantes with the bravado necessary to take on Merryweather Security. They’ve got Charlie Reed, and Charlie’s got a plan. Now all they need is a skilled operative reckless enough to join the fight and word is, they’ve got your number.

Take on Merryweather in Project Overthrow — available now.
